page.description: The Grid Builder contains the following tools on it's toolbar.

case.title: Save As
case.description: Saves the currently open grid after asking for the path and filename.

case.title: Save Page
case.description: Creates a temporary file that contains the grid, optionally opening the page in the HTML Editor.

case.title: Open
case.description: Allows you to select and open an existing grid from any of your projects.

case.title: New
case.description: Allows you to create a new grid.

case.title: Browser
case.description: Displays the grid component in a temporary page in your browser of choice.

case.title: Remote Test
case.description: Test on a remote device (such as a phone or tablet)

case.title: Publish
case.description: Publishes the grid to the destination associated with the selected profile.

case.title: WebÂ Projects
case.description: Displays the Web Projects Control Panel.

case.title: Server
case.description: Turn the server on and off, when on the server icon appears green.
